name: Rodent Revolt
description:
Rodent Revolt is a 3D puzzle game wherein you've to go through a series of tasks in order to rescue your fellow mice destroying the research lab a the same time.

Needs PS4 controller.

---------------

Team Name: Name.Png

Programmer: Fraser Barker 

Lead Designer: Jordan Douglas

Level Designer: Sean McCann

Artists: Swapnal Godawat, Ben Gregg
